meanings.definition: A solid figure having five plane faces.
meanings.sent1: I learned about pentahedrons in geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The children built pentahedrons out of colorful blocks.
meanings.sent3: The pentahedrons at the toy store looked like fun puzzles.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of pentahedrons, each representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The pentahedrons shimmered in the sunlight, casting geometric shadows on the ground.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient pentahedrons from different civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The artist sculpted intricate pentahedrons out of clay.
meanings.sent3: The pentahedrons in the game were the key to unlocking the next level.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like pentahedrons, each side representing a different perspective.
meanings.sent5: The pentahedrons floated gracefully in the virtual reality simulation, mesmerizing the players.
